Name: Garden Of Mooj
About the game: This is a mooj Garden of Mooj is a cute 3D sandbox game with in depth life simulation. Guide your mooj as they breed and evolve over time, unlocking new structures for your garden. Or, just relax and play with your mooj for a bit. Each mooj is completely unique, with their own name, pattern, coloring, and more Manage your mooj's diet carefully to control their evolution Forage for food throughout the garden, with over 100 unique foods to discover Defend from monsters at night Compete in mooj races for hats Discover forgotten secrets by raising specific types of mooj Construct various buildings to increase your garden's revenue
